transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Ji.
Executive: Ji, Tesheshu ji, Jai Maa Bhawani se baat kar raha hu Mathura se.
Customer: Kahan se kar rahe hain sir?
Customer: Mathura se.
Executive: Company ka name batayenge aap apne?
Customer: Jai Maa Bhawani.
Executive: Sorry, kya naam hai company ka aapke?
Customer: Jai Maa Bhawani Heidelberg offset machinery. Jai Maa Bhawani.
Executive: Ah, ji, ji, thik hai.
Executive: Haan ji, haan ji, haan ji. Boliye sir.
Customer: Ye mera ji samajh mein nahi aa raha. Haan, bhai, wire ko aap lead, kisi bhi wire ko lead bana ke kyun daal rahe ho?
Executive: Kaise lead bana ke daal rahe hain matlab sir? Batayenge aap thoda sa?
Customer: Haan, bilkul batayenge aap system mein check karenge.
Executive: Haan, haan.
Customer: Dekhiye.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Wo lead jo diya hai jo aapko.
Customer: Abhi aap check karna fake enquiry karke aapko dala hai.
Executive: Ek second sir, main aapki bhi profile pe hu. Maine open kiya hua hai.
Customer: Dekho ladke ne diya hai aapko.
Executive: Hmm hmm.
Customer: Main aapko, main aapko apne WhatsApp number se hi karu kya?
Customer: Please aap dusre number batao 7891. Abhi aapko message dal diya hai. 7891.
Executive: Hello?
Customer: Aap, haan ji boliye sir.
Customer: 7891.
Executive: 7891.
Customer: 77.
Executive: 77.
Customer: 37.
Executive: 37.
Customer: 63.
Executive: 63. Ji, kar sakte hain. Dekhiye aapko mera ispe hi ka message mila?
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Aapka shayad data off hai kya?
Customer: Ek second chalu raha hu.
Customer: Hmm, ab double tick hua hai.
Executive: Ji.
Customer: Le bhai.
Customer: Review mein review kar diya hai to review karne ke baad hat jaati hai wo.
Customer: Hamare mein system mein check karna na.
Customer: Hamare paas se hat gayi wo, remove kar diya.
Customer: Ye wo pichli lead bhi daali hai.
Customer: Hmm hmm. To aapke system mein dikhayegi na.
Executive: Ab main aapko, haan, ab main aapko online rate aapka meeting ka link share kar du kya? Join kar lijiye fir mujhe bhi dikhegi screen, aapko bhi dikhegi.
Customer: Are.
Executive: Sir, hat jayega to nahi lead manager mein se aap search kar lijiye us name se.
Customer: Review karne ke baad hat jata hai aapko nahi pata system.
Executive: Ji?
Customer: Review karne ke baad hat jata hai wo lead manager mein se feedback dene ke baad.
Executive: Lead jab customer aapko rating ka link de deta hai uske baad hat jata hai aap ye bol rahe hain?
Customer: Nahi, nahi jo lead manager mein se jo hota hai na rating usme hoti hai.
Executive: Haan.
Customer: Bolo.
Customer: Yaar mujhe kal baar baar ka phone aa raha hai aur ye ticket call chal raha hai mera. Tumne baat ki thi tum karoge?
Customer: Wahi jisko WhatsApp pe uske niche company chal rahi thi.
Customer: Karoge?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ji boliye.
Customer: Aap kya hai aapko nahi dikhai de raha system mein aapke?
Executive: Sir, mere system pe lead manager nahi chalta hai. Wo dummy account dikhta hai, aapka personal hota hai. Abhi to maine aapko wo share kiya hua hai mail ID pe aapki Jai Maa JK600 ki aap screen share karke mujhe show kara de. Mujhe nahi dikhega sir wo lead manager aapka exact kyunki wo hamare paas uska access hi nahi hai ki hum dekh paye. Wo aapke end se dikhega hum.
Executive: Main WhatsApp pe bhej du kya aap aise join kar lijiye. Aap, aap kaise use karte hain IndiaMART mobile se ki system se?
Customer: Mobile.
Executive: Koi issue nahi hai, mobile pe hi bata dungi.
Customer: Thoda screen share karke bhi kya karoge jo dikh nahi nahi dikh raha maine review kar diya hua hai pehle se.
Executive: Hello?
Executive: Haan ji sir, aap mujhe ek baat please batayenge aapka matlab main kya issue aa raha hai? Aap customer ne rating di aur wo hat gaya, haan?
Customer: Are lead waisi aayi hai galat.
Executive: Lead galat aayi hai? Kaisi galat aayi hai? Product se related nahi hai, location nahi hai, quantity nahi hai.
Customer: Ka matlab ye hai baat ko samjhiye customer aapse jo maang raha hai usko wahi baat kijiye na usko wahi cheez bhejiye na galat kyun bhej rahe ho?
Customer: Banda bol raha hai ki mere ko koi part chahiye aur aapne part ko offset bana kar ke lead bana kar ke fenk diya hamare paas. Hum usko baat kar rahe hain. Baat kar rahe hain lead hum hum usme se enquiry utha rahe hain aur uthate wo bol raha nahi sir maine nahi diya. Meri baat hi nahi hui. Maine to ye bola hi nahi hai mere offset ki baat hi nahi hui. Meri to kisi part ke bare mein meri unse baat hui thi IndiaMART walon se. Inhone lead bana ke bhej diya to main kya karu?
Executive: Achha.
Customer: Aap subah subah, subah subah aap kisi ke paas jaye aur koi aapko bulaye aur wo kahe maine nahi, maine to bulaya hi nahi aapko call hi nahi kiya kaisa lagega aapko?
Executive: Sir, to main samajh gaya. Haan ji, main aapki baat samajh gayi. Aapke kehne ka matlab hai ki jo enquiry hai wo aapke products ki related nahi hai customer ka wo requirement hi nahi hai jo lead hai.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, enquiry to related hamare products ke liye hai dikha rahi hai lekin banda bol kuch raha hai aur aap bhej kuch rahe hain.
Customer: Banda bol raha hai ke mere ko to koi part chahiye tha kisi dusri matlab requirement anusar. Printing se to matlab sambandh hi nahi hai.
Customer: Aur aur usko unhone printing bana ke bhej diya to ye kya hai? Kuch bhi uthao, kuch bhi fenko IndiaMART.
Executive: Dekhiye ye apne ko maine kai baar complaint kiya fir kar raha hu. Mere ko clear, clarify hi enquiry chahiye.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Aap samjhiye ke mera jo limited hota hai hamare paas jo aap bhej rahe ho lead to limited hai unlimited to nahi bhej rahe.
Executive: To usme se daily do, teen, do, teen kharab ja rahi hai kya matlab hai ye sab baat?
Executive: Fir pehle aap kharab jaane par aap remove karne ke baad dusri enquiry humko de dete the fresh.
Executive: Aur ab, ab wo hota bhi nahi wo to hamari minus ho jati hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Humne dekha hai tumhare product ka banda hai, hamare kareeb ka banda hai humne turant usko accept kiya, utha liya aur wo keh raha nahi sir matlab hi nahi.
Executive: Hmm. Main ye aisa recording bhej dunga unko pata chal jayega.
Customer: Kul mila ke ye main aapko pehle bhi complaint kar chuka hu fir kar raha hu. Aap clarify karke, verify karke hi bhejo. Otherwise mat daliye aise, aise mat daliye. Galat hai, galat feedback ja raha hai aapka.
Executive: Abhi se aapki saal bhar se shikayat chal rahi hai aapki pehle nahi thi.
Executive: Hmm.
Executive: Main bata deti hu aapko jo aap bol rahe hain ki dikh rahi hai product related hai lekin jab aap connect kar rahe hain to wo customer bol raha hai ki nahi hamari kuch aur requirement hai IndiaMART apne aap se bol raha hai ye aap bol rahe hain na? To main yahan pe ye bolna chah rahi hu ki kabhi kabhi aisa hota hai ki customer jo hota hai aap ya ek kaam kariye aap GST verified lead ko purchase kariye ki customer ki real requirement ho uski dealing ho aur secondly kabhi kabhi buyer bhi flip karte hain sir aisa nahi hota ki galti se.
Customer: Ek second, ek second, ek second. GST isme se enquiry nahi li ja sakti madam. Aap galat keh rahe ho aap. Jab GST verify karke hum uski lead ko uthaye ye alag baat hai. Koi zaruri nahi hai ki GST dharak hi machine kharid sakta hai ya GST dharak hi business kar sakta hai. Kya private person business nahi kar sakta?
Executive: Bilkul karta hai sir, bilkul, bilkul wo bhi baat aapki bilkul sahi hai lekin thoda sa itna.
Customer: Maan ke chaliye, maan ke chaliye kya, kya vehicle wahi chala sakta hai jo taxi permit hai jiske paas? Kya without taxi permit nahi chala sakta?
Executive: Nahi, nahi chal sakta hai sir, dono pe chalta hai aur chalta hi hai.
Customer: Aapne abhi yahi kaha na aap check karke verify karke dekhiye GST dharak hai to aap lead ko lijiye aisa nahi hota hai. Mera shikayat ek hi hai aur wo hamesha agar aap system ko apni taraf jo lead ko purify karke bhejta hai us bande ko barabar nahi pata. Wo kuch bhi bhej deta hai.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Kuch bhi uthaya aur daal diya. Aisa mat kijiye aapka naam achha hai aur ye aisa hoga to fir kya karenge? Nahi nahi koi bhi customer karega.
Executive: Hmm.
Customer: Nahi jab track pe zyada wo jab hum jis jis track pe ja rahe hain usme zyada traffic dikhega to hum track dusra change karenge na?
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul, bilkul sir.
Customer: Aur jahan hame suvidha nazar aayegi fir wo dekh lenge. Ye, ye pehle nahi tha aapka abhi zyada ho raha hai.
Executive: Sir, main yahan pe aapko ye bhi ek baat aur bolna chahungi ki aisa bhi to hota hai na ki aapke paas matlab 100% jo bhi buyer aaye wo zaruri wo purchase hi kare. To online offline dono mein wo cheeze hoti hi hain.
Customer: Nahi, nahi bilkul right kaha aapne.
Executive: Ye zaruri nahi 100% agar purchaser aa jaye to fir to baat hi kya hai.
Customer: Bilkul, bilkul, bilkul. Fir to balle balle ho jayegi.
Executive: Ji, ji, ji.
Executive: Aisa to kabhi nahi ho sakta hai. Kabhi kisi bhi vishay mein nahi ho sakta hai.
Executive: Kisi bhi vyavhar mein jayenge 100% to kisi ke wo aata hi nahi hai.
Executive: Bilkul, bilkul sir, bilkul 100% conversion to na offline hai na online hai. Par shikayat aapki, aapki ek mahine ya dedh mahine pehle bhi enquiry complaint yahi thi aur chali hui hai. Fir usko unhone apne ko lead deke nahi samjha diya aisa nahi hai. Hum na to lead lene ka koi hamara wo hai personal extra. Hamari jo lead hai wo hum complete milni chahiye, achhi milni chahiye taki hum grow karenge to fir aapke grow karne ki ichha karenge hamara bhi kuch plus ho jaye. Lead manager ho ya lead grow ho jaye, star ho jaye yani jo bhi ho aapse plus kare. Aapke jo humne maximize liya hai isme utna humko nahi de pa raha jitna hame pehle diya gaya hai. Lead manager mein se.
Executive: Jo pehle humko aur abhi jo de rakha hai usme to utna mil nahi maximize diya hai na aapne hame maximize kaam aa nahi raha.
Executive: Please my request is baat pe dhyan dijiye okay?
Executive: Sir, yahan pe do teen cheeze aur bhi hai na pehle ke comparison jaise aap bol rahe hain aapki by lead wala issue main check karwa leti hu apni team mein inki se baat karke. Secondly aapka call ka response, call ka response ratio pehle se kam ho gaya hai plus aapki by lead recent thi yani aaj jo by lead bhi purchase karte hain wo kafi der ke baad yani 4 ghante, 8 ghante baad hi karte hain. To usme bhi ye cheez hoti hai ki customer ab by ek by lead pe ek log to baat karte nahi hain, ek by lead pe total 5 log baat karte hain.
Customer: Ye, ye baat, ye baat bhi meri ho chuki hai. Ye banda, ye banda le chuka hota hai product to wo kabhi ye nahi bolega sir maine nahi dala. Wo ye dalega sir mera ho gaya baat khatam ho gayi.
Customer: Ye dalega wo ye nahi bolega. Wo bolega bas ho gaya tha.
Executive: Sir, buyer ka mindset ab wo bhi ekdam sahi bol raha hai ye to aapko bhi nahi pata aur hame bhi nahi pata chal payega right? Ki uski dealing hi ho gayi ho ya wo taalne ke liye bol raha hai wo kya bolna chah raha hai wo to wahi janta hai na.
Customer: Customer aap verify kar lo usko. Main aapko number ka system main aapko bata raha hu. Faridabad Haryana se doctor printing machine dal rakhi hai mere maine jo enquiry accept kiya hai to aap usse check karo na pata to chal jayega na aapko mere kaun si enquiry li hai abhi tak aapse pehle.
Executive: Ek second aapne aaj do enquiry li hui hai sir.
Customer: Bilkul.
Executive: 12 tarikh ko.
Customer: Aur ek Hari.
Customer: Haan Hari isko check karo Hari ke bare mein baat kar raha hu main.
Customer: Aap Hari ke bare mein baat kar rahe hain?
Executive: Hmm bilkul.
Executive: Thik hai main ek baar baat karwa deti hu apni team mein inki.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Isse clear hota hai ki aap
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is receiving irrelevant buyleads.

- Customer states leads are not verified.

- Customer's lead manager is not working properly.

- Customer is not getting proper support.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to check the by lead issue.

- Executive offered to connect with customer online.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check the by lead issue.



Alert (If Any):

complaint

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, verification, complaint
